title: TestCaseFailureStatus
description: Schema to capture test case result failure status.

id.description: Unique identifier of this failure instance (unique across a failure cycle, i.e. new -> ack -> ... -> resolved.

sequenceId.description: Sequence ID for a failure status. Statuses belonging to the same sequence will have the same ID

timestamp.description: Timestamp on which the failure was created.

testCaseFailureStatusDetails.description: Details of the test case failure status.

updatedBy.description: User who updated the test case failure status.

updatedAt.description: Time when test case failure status was updated.
